verses.verse: To the chief <S%H5329><s%> Musician, <S%H5329><s%> Maschil, <S%H4905><s%> for the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Korah. <S%H7141><s%> As the hart <S%H354><s%> pants <S%H6165><s%> after <S%H5921><s%> the water <S%H4325><s%> brooks, <S%H650><s%> so <S%H3651><s%> pants <S%H6165><s%> my soul <S%H5315><s%> after <S%H413><s%> you, O God. <S%H430><s%>

My soul <S%H5315><s%> thirsts <S%H6770><s%> for God, <S%H430><s%> for the living <S%H2416><s%> God: <S%H410><s%> when <S%H4970><s%> shall I come <S%H935><s%> and appear <S%H7200><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> God? <S%H430><s%>

My tears <S%H1832><s%> have been <S%H1961><s%> my meat <S%H3899><s%> day <S%H3119><s%> and night, <S%H3915><s%> while they continually <S%H3605><s%> <S%H3117><s%> say <S%H559><s%> to me, Where <S%H346><s%> is your God? <S%H430><s%>

When I remember <S%H2142><s%> these <S%H428><s%> things, I pour <S%H8210><s%> out my soul <S%H5315><s%> in me: for I had gone <S%H5674><s%> with the multitude, <S%H5519><s%> I went <S%H1718><s%> with them to the house <S%H1004><s%> of God, <S%H430><s%> with the voice <S%H6963><s%> of joy <S%H7440><s%> and praise, <S%H8426><s%> with a multitude <S%H1995><s%> that kept <S%H2287><s%> holy day. <S%H2287><s%>

Why <S%H4100><s%> are you cast <S%H7817><s%> down, <S%H7817><s%> O my soul? <S%H5315><s%> and why are you disquieted <S%H1993><s%> in me? hope <S%H3176><s%> you in God: <S%H430><s%> for I shall yet <S%H5750><s%> praise <S%H3034><s%> him for the help <S%H3444><s%> of his countenance. <S%H6440><s%>

O my God, <S%H430><s%> my soul <S%H5315><s%> is cast <S%H7817><s%> down <S%H7817><s%> within <S%H5921><s%> me: therefore <S%H5921><s%> <S%H3651><s%> will I remember <S%H2142><s%> you from the land <S%H776><s%> of Jordan, <S%H3383><s%> and of the Hermonites, <S%H2769><s%> from the hill <S%H2022><s%> Mizar. <S%H4706><s%>

Deep <S%H8415><s%> calls <S%H7121><s%> to deep <S%H8415><s%> at the noise <S%H6963><s%> of your waterspouts: <S%H6794><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> your waves <S%H4867><s%> and your billows <S%H1530><s%> are gone <S%H5674><s%> over <S%H5921><s%> me.

Yet the LORD <S%H3068><s%> will command <S%H6680><s%> his loving kindness <S%H2617><s%> in the day time, <S%H3119><s%> and in the night <S%H3915><s%> his song <S%H7892><s%> shall be with me, and my prayer <S%H8605><s%> to the God <S%H410><s%> of my life. <S%H2416><s%>

I will say <S%H559><s%> to God <S%H410><s%> my rock, <S%H5553><s%> Why <S%H4100><s%> have you forgotten <S%H7911><s%> me? why <S%H4100><s%> go <S%H3212><s%> I mourning <S%H6937><s%> because of the oppression <S%H3906><s%> of the enemy? <S%H341><s%>

As with a sword <S%H7524><s%> in my bones, <S%H6106><s%> my enemies <S%H6887><s%> reproach <S%H2778><s%> me; while they say <S%H559><s%> daily <S%H3605><s%> <S%H3117><s%> to me, Where <S%H346><s%> is your God? <S%H430><s%>

Why <S%H4100><s%> are you cast <S%H7817><s%> down, <S%H7817><s%> O my soul? <S%H5315><s%> and why <S%H4100><s%> are you disquieted <S%H1993><s%> within <S%H5921><s%> me? hope <S%H3176><s%> you in God: <S%H430><s%> for I shall yet <S%H5750><s%> praise <S%H3034><s%> him, who is the health <S%H3444><s%> of my countenance, <S%H6440><s%> and my God. <S%H430><s%>
